# Utils Module

# Functions

calcrn(b, u)

Calculate R-Naught

calcb(rn, u1)

Calculate Infection rate

calcu(rn1, b1)

Calculate Recovery Rate

# calcrn(b, u)

Calculate R-Naught

Kind: global function

Param Type Description
b Number The infection rate
u Number The recovery rate

# calcb(rn, u1)

Calculate Infection rate

Kind: global function

Param Type Description
rn Number R-Naught Value
u1 Number The recovery rate

# calcu(rn1, b1)

Calculate Recovery Rate

Kind: global function

Param Type Description
rn1 Number R-Naught Value
b1 Number The infection rate
